headline: Does AI Pullback, Saudi Stake Shift and GTA VI Timeline Change The Bull Case For Take-Two (TTWO)?
summary: In February 2026, Raymond James upgraded Take-Two Interactive Software to Strong Buy after a pullback linked to AI concerns, while approximately 11 million shares moved from Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund to its wholly owned Savvy Games Group, and the company reaffirmed its November 2026 Grand Theft Auto VI release despite near-term margin pressure. This combination of an analyst upgrade, continued Saudi-backed ownership through Savvy Games Group, and commitment to a flagship launch...
